title: Solid Joys Daily Devotional
description: Solid Joys is a daily devotional written and read by John Piper. These short and substantive readings will feed your joy in Jesus every day of the year. Discover more from Piper at desiringGod.org.

episodes.title: Peace to Those with Whom He Is Pleased
episodes.subtitle: Advent  |  Day 6
episodes.description: The key that unlocks the treasure chest of God’s peace is faith in the promises of God.

episodes.title: No Detour from Calvary
episodes.subtitle: Advent  |  Day 5
episodes.description: God could have seen to it that Jesus have a room at his birth. But that would have been a detour off the Calvary road.

episodes.title: For God’s Little People
episodes.subtitle: Advent  |  Day 4
episodes.description: Do not think, because you experience adversity, that the hand of the Lord is shortened.

episodes.title: The Long-Awaited Visitation
episodes.subtitle: Advent  |  Day 3
episodes.description: For the mind of faith, a promised act of God is as good as done.

episodes.title: Mary’s Magnificent God
episodes.subtitle: Advent  |  Day 2
episodes.description: The only people whose soul can truly magnify the Lord are people like Elizabeth and Mary. So, this Advent, imitate their lowliness and cheerful humility.

episodes.title: Prepare the Way
episodes.subtitle: Advent  |  Day 1
episodes.description: This Advent, bend the efforts of your imagination to make the wonder of Jesus’s arrival visible for your children.

episodes.title: The Triumphant Shame of the Cross
episodes.subtitle: No matter how dirty with sin you are, through Christ you can see the light of God’s glory and believe.
episodes.description: No matter how dirty with sin you are, through Christ you can see the light of God’s glory and believe.

episodes.title: The Only Conscience-Cleanser
episodes.subtitle: Our greatest problem is alienation from God. The only solution is the blood of Christ.
episodes.description: Our greatest problem is alienation from God. The only solution is the blood of Christ.

episodes.title: The Root of Ingratitude
episodes.subtitle: At the root of all ingratitude is the love of one’s own greatness. But genuine gratitude glorifies God because it admits that we need him.
episodes.description: At the root of all ingratitude is the love of one’s own greatness. But genuine gratitude glorifies God because it admits that we need him.

episodes.title: How to Magnify God
episodes.subtitle: The whole duty of the Christian can be summed up in this: feel, think, and act in a way that will make God look as great as he really is.
episodes.description: The whole duty of the Christian can be summed up in this: feel, think, and act in a way that will make God look as great as he really is.

episodes.title: Jesus Prays for Us
episodes.subtitle: Our salvation is as secure as Christ’s priesthood is indestructible. His deity and resurrection from the dead secure his indestructible priesthood for us.
episodes.description: Our salvation is as secure as Christ’s priesthood is indestructible. His deity and resurrection from the dead secure his indestructible priesthood for us.

episodes.title: Glorify God by Giving Thanks
episodes.subtitle: A life that gives glory to God for his grace and a life of deepest gladness are the same life. And what makes them one is thankfulness.
episodes.description: A life that gives glory to God for his grace and a life of deepest gladness are the same life. And what makes them one is thankfulness.

episodes.title: Hold Fast to Your Hope
episodes.subtitle: When Christ died for us, he did not buy the freedom from having to hold fast, but the enabling power to hold fast.
episodes.description: When Christ died for us, he did not buy the freedom from having to hold fast, but the enabling power to hold fast.

episodes.title: When God Swears by God
episodes.subtitle: It is as unlikely that God will break his word of promise to bless us as it is that he will despise himself.
episodes.description: It is as unlikely that God will break his word of promise to bless us as it is that he will despise himself.

episodes.title: The Key to Spiritual Maturity
episodes.subtitle: Getting ready to feast on all God’s word is not first an intellectual challenge; it is first a moral challenge.
episodes.description: Getting ready to feast on all God’s word is not first an intellectual challenge; it is first a moral challenge.

episodes.title: The Gravity of Gratitude
episodes.subtitle: A thankful spirit is others-exalting and glad-hearted. Therefore, pray for a great awakening of humble gratitude.
episodes.description: A thankful spirit is others-exalting and glad-hearted. Therefore, pray for a great awakening of humble gratitude.

episodes.title: Five Reasons Death Is Gain
episodes.subtitle: Death is gain because Christians will then be perfect, pain-free, rested, at home, and with Christ.
episodes.description: Death is gain because Christians will then be perfect, pain-free, rested, at home, and with Christ.

episodes.title: We All Need Help
episodes.subtitle: Because we have a Great High Priest, the throne of God is a throne of grace.
episodes.description: Because we have a Great High Priest, the throne of God is a throne of grace.

episodes.title: The Piercing Power of the Word
episodes.subtitle: The word of God is our only hope. It is sharp, living, and active. Therefore, be of good cheer in your battle to believe.
episodes.description: The word of God is our only hope. It is sharp, living, and active. Therefore, be of good cheer in your battle to believe.

episodes.title: Change Is Possible
episodes.subtitle: Don’t be a fatalist. Be a Christian. Change is possible. God is alive. Christ is risen. The promises are true.
episodes.description: Don’t be a fatalist. Be a Christian. Change is possible. God is alive. Christ is risen. The promises are true.

episodes.title: When I Am Anxious
episodes.subtitle: Take up the Bible, ask the Holy Spirit for help, lay the promises up in your heart, and fight the good fight — to live by faith in future grace.
episodes.description: Take up the Bible, ask the Holy Spirit for help, lay the promises up in your heart, and fight the good fight — to live by faith in future grace.

episodes.title: Fighting Words
episodes.subtitle: When you feel discouraged and anxious, cling to God’s promises to be with you and uphold you.
episodes.description: When you feel discouraged and anxious, cling to God’s promises to be with you and uphold you.

episodes.title: The Marvel of Creation
episodes.subtitle: When you marvel at the wonders of creation, do not marvel at the processes of chance but at the creativity of God.
episodes.description: When you marvel at the wonders of creation, do not marvel at the processes of chance but at the creativity of God.

episodes.title: Do Not Harden Your Heart
episodes.subtitle: The Bible’s warnings are written that you might believe and endure, and have life.
episodes.description: The Bible’s warnings are written that you might believe and endure, and have life.

episodes.title: How Satan Serves God
episodes.subtitle: Satan cannot destroy us. In fact, God turns all his attacks finally against him and for us.
episodes.description: Satan cannot destroy us. In fact, God turns all his attacks finally against him and for us.

episodes.title: We Are His House
episodes.subtitle: Becoming a Christian and being a Christian happen in the same way: by hoping in Jesus.
episodes.description: Becoming a Christian and being a Christian happen in the same way: by hoping in Jesus.

episodes.title: Wipe Your Fears Away
episodes.subtitle: When anxiety blurs our vision of God’s glory, it does not mean that we are faithless. It means our faith is being attacked.
episodes.description: When anxiety blurs our vision of God’s glory, it does not mean that we are faithless. It means our faith is being attacked.

episodes.title: Marveling at the End of History
episodes.subtitle: One day, we will see God’s glory, and marvel at it in such a way that he will be glorified in us for all the world to see.
episodes.description: One day, we will see God’s glory, and marvel at it in such a way that he will be glorified in us for all the world to see.

episodes.title: We Honor What We Enjoy
episodes.subtitle: It is possible to pursue God without glorifying God. If we want our quest to honor God, we must pursue him for the joy of fellowship with him.
episodes.description: It is possible to pursue God without glorifying God. If we want our quest to honor God, we must pursue him for the joy of fellowship with him.

episodes.title: Is God’s Love Conditional?
episodes.subtitle: There are precious experiences of the love of God that require that we fight pride, seek humility, and cherish the nearness of God.
episodes.description: There are precious experiences of the love of God that require that we fight pride, seek humility, and cherish the nearness of God.

episodes.title: Love One Another Gladly
episodes.subtitle: Loving acts are genuine to the degree that they are not done begrudgingly.
episodes.description: Loving acts are genuine to the degree that they are not done begrudgingly.

episodes.title: Do You Neglect Your Salvation?
episodes.subtitle: Being a Christian is a very serious business, though not a sour business. We are simply blood-earnest about being happy in our great salvation.
episodes.description: Being a Christian is a very serious business, though not a sour business. We are simply blood-earnest about being happy in our great salvation.

episodes.title: The Real Problem with Anxiety
episodes.subtitle: What you thought was a mere struggle with an anxious disposition might really be a far deeper struggle with trusting God.
episodes.description: What you thought was a mere struggle with an anxious disposition might really be a far deeper struggle with trusting God.

episodes.title: The Meaning of Suffering
episodes.subtitle: It is truer in suffering than anywhere else that God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in him.
episodes.description: It is truer in suffering than anywhere else that God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in him.

episodes.title: Rejoicing in Pain
episodes.subtitle: Whether we focus on the riches of the reward or the refining effects of suffering, God’s purpose is that our joy in suffering be sustained.
episodes.description: Whether we focus on the riches of the reward or the refining effects of suffering, God’s purpose is that our joy in suffering be sustained.

episodes.title: Christ’s Sufferings in Us
episodes.subtitle: We exhibit the sufferings of Christ when we ourselves suffer for those we are trying to win.
episodes.description: We exhibit the sufferings of Christ when we ourselves suffer for those we are trying to win.

episodes.title: The Seminary of Suffering
episodes.subtitle: God designs suffering not only as a way to wean Christians off of self and onto grace, but also as a way to spotlight that grace and make it shine.
episodes.description: God designs suffering not only as a way to wean Christians off of self and onto grace, but also as a way to spotlight that grace and make it shine.

episodes.title: The Danger of Drifting
episodes.subtitle: Be satisfied in Jesus so that you do not get lured downstream by deceitful desires.
episodes.description: Be satisfied in Jesus so that you do not get lured downstream by deceitful desires.

episodes.title: Sin, Satan, Sickness, or Sabotage
episodes.subtitle: Suffering proves our allegiance to Christ’s goodness and reveals his worth as an all-sufficient prize.
episodes.description: Suffering proves our allegiance to Christ’s goodness and reveals his worth as an all-sufficient prize.

episodes.title: Radical Recompense
episodes.subtitle: Jesus himself makes up for every sacrifice he will ever call us to make. It is worth it to lose it all in order to gain Christ.
episodes.description: Jesus himself makes up for every sacrifice he will ever call us to make. It is worth it to lose it all in order to gain Christ.

episodes.title: Possible with God
episodes.subtitle: God has a people in every people group. He will call them through the gospel with Creator power. And they will believe!
episodes.description: God has a people in every people group. He will call them through the gospel with Creator power. And they will believe!

episodes.title: Medicine for the Missionary
episodes.subtitle: “All things are possible with God!” — in front the words give hope, and behind they give humility. They are the antidote to both despair and pride.
episodes.description: “All things are possible with God!” — in front the words give hope, and behind they give humility. They are the antidote to both despair and pride.

episodes.title: The Great Missionary Hope
episodes.subtitle: God’s call is irresistible in the sense that it can overcome all resistance. It is infallibly effective according to God’s purpose.
episodes.description: God’s call is irresistible in the sense that it can overcome all resistance. It is infallibly effective according to God’s purpose.

episodes.title: Christ Is Like Sunlight
episodes.subtitle: We see the sun by means of seeing the rays of the sun. So also we see God the Father by seeing Jesus.
episodes.description: We see the sun by means of seeing the rays of the sun. So also we see God the Father by seeing Jesus.

episodes.title: God’s Final, Decisive Word
episodes.subtitle: The Word that God spoke by his Son is the decisive Word. It will not be followed in this age by any greater word or replacement word.
episodes.description: The Word that God spoke by his Son is the decisive Word. It will not be followed in this age by any greater word or replacement word.

episodes.title: Hedonism for Husbands and Wives
episodes.subtitle: When Christ redeems marriage, he does not dismantle loving headship and willing submission. He restores it.
episodes.description: When Christ redeems marriage, he does not dismantle loving headship and willing submission. He restores it.

episodes.title: The Mystery of Marriage
episodes.subtitle: Husbands and wives should seek to live after the distinctive model of God’s pure and glad design for Christ and the church.
episodes.description: Husbands and wives should seek to live after the distinctive model of God’s pure and glad design for Christ and the church.

episodes.title: Prayer’s First Priority
episodes.subtitle: The first priority in praying is to ask our heavenly Father to cause his name to be hallowed. In us. In the church. In the world. Everywhere.
episodes.description: The first priority in praying is to ask our heavenly Father to cause his name to be hallowed. In us. In the church. In the world. Everywhere.

episodes.title: Love’s Greatest Happiness
episodes.subtitle: The union between Christ and his bride is so close that any good done to her is a good done to himself.
episodes.description: The union between Christ and his bride is so close that any good done to her is a good done to himself.

episodes.title: Jesus’s Joy in Marriage
episodes.subtitle: Jesus did not want a dirty and unholy wife. Therefore, he was willing to die to cleanse her so that he could present her to himself.
episodes.description: Jesus did not want a dirty and unholy wife. Therefore, he was willing to die to cleanse her so that he could present her to himself.
